mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectGodNotiDspCtgryCnnc Generator(Generator) 2019-11-18 */ GOD_NOTI_SN , DSP_CTGRY_NO , DELETE_YN , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM GOD_NOTI_DSP_CTGRY_CNNC WHERE 1 = 1 AND GOD_NOTI_SN = #{godNotiSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND DSP_CTGRY_NO = #{dspCtgryNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
